content.rendered:
THE NITTY GRITTY.

Are you really still charging your phone with a plugin connector in 2022? We’re not judging. But you might want to upgrade from good old charging cables because the STEDI WIRELESS CHARGER | SMILEY is here, and it’s turbocharged to 15W! Features the iconic STEDI smile.

  • 15W Fast Charging
  • Qi-Compatibility
  • Aluminium Construction
  • LED Indicator light
  • Rubber Pad
  • 8mm Detection Distance

TECH SPECS

INPUT 12V/2A, 9V/2A, 5V/2A
OUTPUT 15W/10W/7.5W/5W
CONVERSION > 73%
ELECTRIC INTERFACE USB Type-C Port to USB-A
TRANSMISSION DISTANCE < 8MM
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS 98X98X62.5MM
CERTIFICATION CE RoHS FC

 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

  • 1 x STEDI WIRELESS CHARGER | SMILEY
  • 1 x USB-C to USB-A charging cable

 

Click here to see the full range of Stedi lights available from Automax 4X4.

 

Follow Automax 4X4 on Facebook or Instagram to see the latest 4X4 upgrades and news.

excerpt.rendered:
THE ICONIC STEDI SMILE.

Bring your smile to your home, office or in the back of the UTE canopy with the STEDI WIRELESS CHARGER | SMILEY
